section.p: To prepare the translation of documents you can generate terminology lists, for example, to add new terms to a dictionary or generate a from previous translations.

To translate the documents, the offers common editor functions and specific functions for translation, such as dictionary lookup and copying translation proposals. Using these functions helps you translate documents more efficiently.
When you translate several documents on the same subject, the used will grow, and the number of translation proposals will increase.

section.title: Results
section.p: You can choose the sequence in which you translate documents. You can also translate parts of a document at a time and continue later until the documents are completely translated. If needed, you can export partially translated documents and give them to other users who can continue the translation.

When you have completed the translation of the segments of a document, automatically switches to the postediting mode where you can review the translation and check the spelling. The you used contains all segments and their translations and can be used for documents containing similar texts. You can postedit it whenever a translation needs to be modified.
